I'm still scared of turbulence when I fly I fly all the time, but I've never gotten used to that
I'm still the guy just going (eeek) like I'm that guy
I'm terrified I hate it when I sit next to someone that won't acknowledge the turbulence I was on this one flight
I had the window seat the guy in the middle

He's just sitting there like this

And he's-and we. There was one of those big drops. You know every once in a while

and I was like will you please  acknowledged that our butts just dropped a thousand feet
Just give me a wink and a nod. Like yes. This is terrifying
Just something I do this you can try this too

I do this reverse psychology thing so now when I'm in a plane and it gets choppy in my head
I go yeah, take it down
Let's do it. Let's put it in the ground. Let's see what you got
